actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution establishing a commission to recommend an appropriate memorial to former United States Representative Allard K. Lowenstein.

summary.text: Establishes a Commission to recommend an appropriate memorial to former Representative Allard K. Lowenstein. Requires the Commission to transmit a report to the House of Representatives not later than June 30, 1981, containing its recommendations.

titles.title: A resolution establishing a commission to recommend an appropriate memorial to former United States Representative Allard K. Lowenstein.
